description: Rodgers sweating over fitness of Celtic centre-backs - gossip
title: Rodgers sweating over fitness of Celtic centre-backs - gossip
title_page: Rodgers sweating over fitness of Celtic centre-backs - gossip - BBC Sport
maintext:
Celtic boss Brendan Rodgers is sweating over the fitness of defensive duo Carl Starfelt and new signing Maik Nawrocki a week before their Premiership season opener, but Cameron Carter-Vickers is on course for a possible comeback in Tuesday's friendly with Athletic Bilbao. (Scottish Sun), external
Despite the growing injury pile-up, Rodgers insists Celtic won't be rushed into adding defensive reinforcements. (Daily Record), external
Rodgers will lead Celtic to 15-point Premiership triumph over Rangers, believes former Parkhead defender Alan Stubbs. (Daily Record), external
